title: Item encoding in SQL Database
author: lehase
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.
-->

<!-- Bug -->
When I try to save my connections in MSSQL DB, non latin characters are transformed into '?'. Please change latin encoding to UTF-8. Thanks!
|Detail|Value|
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75.7008  |...

iterations.description: The issue has no description or comments, so the exact SQL encoding problem, affected fields, and reproduction steps are unknown.

notes:
